general.title: Warehouse groups
general.subtitle: Create groups to organise your warehouses and assign rules to manage warehouse responsibilities for your different business cases.

list.whitespaceSubTitle: Create groups to organise your warehouses in your own individual way.
list.textDeleteConfirm-1: Deleting a warehouse group removes its assignment to products. These products may no longer be available.
list.textDeleteConfirm-2: Are you sure you want to delete the warehouse group

detail.title: Warehouse group
detail.helpTextPriority: Warehouse groups with a higher priority are given preference if more than one rule applies.
detail.textDeleteWarehouseWarning: Deleting this warehouse group will be permanent.
detail.textDeleteConfirm-1: Deleting a warehouse group removes its assignment to products. These products may no longer be available.
detail.textDeleteConfirm-2: Are you sure you want to delete the warehouse group
detail.ruleInfoText: Use rules to manage the availability of this Warehouse group individually. If no rule is selected, your warehouse group will be ignored.

warehouseAssignment.textDeleteConfirm-1: Removing an assigned warehouse will make the configured stocks unavailable to this group.
warehouseAssignment.textDeleteConfirm-2: Are you sure you want to remove the assigned warehouse
warehouseAssignment.helpTextWarehousePriority: Warehouses with a higher priority are given preference if more than one warehouse is in a position to fulfill a certain product request.
